snippet: The United Nations said Wednesday that 5,700 people had been killed in the conflict in Yemen since March 26.
abstract: United Nations says 5,700 people have died in Yemen conflict since March 26, and 82 percent of country’s population have needed humanitarian aid.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations said Wednesday that 5,700 people had been killed in the conflict in Yemen since March 26.

headline.main: Yemen: U.N. Tallies War’s Grim Toll
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: U.N. Tallies War’s Grim Toll
